exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.commentary: Match Jan 4th load. High tempo for glycogen depletion.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.commentary: Strict form. Focus on mechanical failure.

exercises.name: DB Bent-Over Rows
exercises.commentary: Squeeze at top. Weight matched to Jan 15th performance.

exercises.name: DB Push Press
exercises.commentary: Aggressive leg drive focus.

exercises.name: DB/KB Swings
exercises.commentary: Returning to 24kg for explosive hip snap.

exercises.name: Finisher: Cable Crunch
exercises.commentary: Spinal flexion focus. Do not use arms.

exercises.name: Walking (LISS)
exercises.commentary: Active recovery during the fast. Prioritize electrolytes.

exercises.name: Machine Hip Thrusts
exercises.commentary: Recommended starting weight. Focus on the 2s hard squeeze at the top.

exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.commentary: Progression: +2kg from Jan 6th. Elbows down, deep range.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.commentary: Peak contraction hold for maximum TUT.

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curls
exercises.commentary: Mind-muscle connection. Slow eccentric.

exercises.name: DB RDL
exercises.commentary: Progression: +2kg from Jan 6th. Max stretch, soft knees.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.commentary: Recommended weight to reach failure in high rep range.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.commentary: Glutes clenched hard to stabilize lumbar spine.

exercises.name: DB Flat Bench
exercises.commentary: Strict control. Corrected weight verified from Jan 7th log.

exercises.name: DB Incline Bench
exercises.commentary: 30-45 degree incline. Focus on chest stretch.

exercises.name: High Incline DB Press
exercises.commentary: 75 degree incline. Neutral spine.

exercises.name: DB Lateral Raise
exercises.commentary: Lead with elbows. Strict isolation.

exercises.name: Cable Rope Pushdown
exercises.commentary: Match Jan 7th performance intensity. Spread rope at bottom.

exercises.name: Overhead Rope Ext
exercises.commentary: Match Jan 7th performance. Focus on the deep long-head stretch.

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.commentary: Slow and controlled. Do not allow lower back to arch.

exercises.name: Wide Lat Pulldown
exercises.commentary: Maintain Jan 15th load and strict form.

exercises.name: V-Handle Cable Row
exercises.commentary: Progression: +5kg from Jan 15th. Keep chest high.

exercises.name: 1-Arm DB Row
exercises.commentary: Progression: +2.5kg from Jan 15th. Arc DB towards hip.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.commentary: External rotation focus. Clean, technical reps.

exercises.name: Incline DB Curl
exercises.commentary: Full stretch behind body. Do not swing.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.commentary: Brachialis focus. Strict vertical pull.

exercises.name: Toes to Bar/Knees
exercises.commentary: Hanging leg raises with full abdominal control.

exercises.name: Moderate Swim
exercises.commentary: Consistency and breathing focus. Steady pace.

exercises.name: Interval Swim
exercises.commentary: 1 Lap Sprint (90% effort) / 2 Laps Recovery pace.
